fields.name: flight_status
fields.doc: Flight Status, such as landed, scheduled, active etc.

fields.name: departure_airport
fields.doc: IATA Code of the Departure Airport. Expected to be YUL.

fields.name: departure_gate
fields.doc: Departure Gate for a given flight departure record.

fields.name: arrival_airport
fields.doc: IATA Code of the Arrival Airport.

fields.name: scheduled_departure
fields.doc: Scheduled Departure timestamp for a given flight departure record.

fields.name: actual_departure
fields.doc: Actual Departure timestamp for a given flight departure record.

fields.name: flight_number
fields.doc: IATA Convention Flight Number for a given flight departure record.
